Some time ago, a website talked about the dangers of public check-ins. Public check-ins are when you tell everyone online where you are. The website said that when you say, "Hey, I’m at this place," you are also telling many people where you are. Some of these people might not be good to meet. This shows that sharing everything online can have bad sides. 
The internet gives us many chances to share our lives with many people. We can share our stories, photos, and feelings. But sometimes, we can lose control and feel lost. This can be sad, but we should not give up. There are lessons from people who used the internet a long time ago. 
In January 1994, a 19-year-old student named Justin Hall started sharing his life online. At that time, the internet was mostly for students and scientists. Hall wanted to share his life, so he created a blog. He wrote about everything and shared many photos. People liked to read his blog because he was brave and shared many things. 
One day, people went to his blog and saw a sad video instead of his usual posts. Hall had fallen in love, but when he wrote about it, he was told to stop blogging or lose his relationship. He felt that sharing his life online made people not trust him. 
In 2002, a woman named Heather Armstrong had a blog called Dooce. She sometimes wrote about her job. One day, a coworker sent her blog link to the bosses at her company, and she lost her job. This shows that what we say online can have real-life consequences. 
Armstrong was sad and stopped blogging for a while, but later she got married and started a new blog about her family. Now, she is very popular as a "mommy blogger," and her writing helps her family. 
The lesson is that the internet lets us say many things, but we should think carefully before we share. 
**Questions:**
1. What is a public check-in?
2. Who is Justin Hall?
3. What happened to Justin Hall when he wrote about his love?
4. What did Heather Armstrong write about in her blog?
5. What is the lesson we learn from this text?

Some scientists started a campaign to warn people about a low-budget film called *What the Bleep Do We Know?* This film mixes documentary and drama to show that there is a lot we do not understand about our universe. Scientists can be a bit proud, but even they do not know everything about the universe. Some scientists warned people about the film, calling it “atrocious” and “dangerous.” This made me want to see the movie.
At first, I did not understand why the film was so important. Some scientists talked about new discoveries that show the universe is stranger than we thought. Then, the film talked about how water molecules can be changed by thoughts. I had heard that a Japanese researcher showed that the shape of water molecules can change based on people’s thoughts. The film showed pictures of ice crystals that looked nice when someone was happy and looked bad when someone was in a bad mood. Many people find this interesting, but scientists often say, “Give me a break.” 
The idea that water can be changed by thoughts is amazing, but we need real proof. Pretty pictures of crystals are not enough. The movie’s claims were not strange enough. For example, water molecules might have energy that comes from nowhere, which could be linked to a force that is making the universe expand. This idea comes from many years of research in labs and observatories around the world.
Scientists are making discoveries that show the universe is stranger than we thought. Astronomers found that the universe is made of an unknown type of matter and is pushed by a mysterious force called “dark energy.” Other discoveries are also surprising. Neuroscientists found that our brains take about half a second to understand what is happening around us. Anthropologists believe they have found where modern humans began and how they spread around the world. Some scientists think there is a link between life on Earth and the design of the universe.
Science is not finished. In fact, we know less than we thought. Many natural events are harder to understand than we believed. New ideas about chaos and uncertainty show that there are limits to what we can know. Some of the best physicists are trying to create a “Theory of Everything” to explain all the forces and particles in the universe. Many people believe that the universe can be described in one word: incredible.
---
**Questions:**
1. What is the name of the film that scientists warned people about?
2. What do some scientists think about the film?
3. What did the film say about water molecules?
4. What did neuroscientists discover about our brains?
5. What is the mysterious force that is pushing the universe to expand?

"Writing novels is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest, while writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. The trees in the forest give shade, and the leaves can be bright gold. In the garden, flowers bloom, and their colors attract bees and butterflies. 
Since I started writing, I have often switched between novels and short stories. After I finish a novel, I want to write short stories. After I finish short stories, I want to write a novel. I never write short stories when I am writing a novel, and I never write a novel when I am working on short stories. Writing these two types of stories uses different parts of my brain, and it takes time to change from one to the other.
I began my career with two short novels in 1975. From 1984 to 1985, I started writing short stories. I did not know much about writing short stories then, so it was hard, but it was a great experience. I felt my imagination grow. Readers liked this new side of me. One of my first short stories, ‘Breaking Waves’, was in my first collection called Tales from Abroad. This was how I started writing short stories.
One reason I enjoy writing short stories is that they do not take a long time to finish. Usually, it takes me about a week to write a short story, but I can change it many times. Writing a novel takes a year or two, and it can feel very long. Sometimes I wonder if I will finish. So, writing short stories is a nice change for me.
Another good thing about short stories is that you can create them from small ideas, like a word or an image. It feels like jazz music, where the story goes where it wants. Also, with short stories, you do not have to worry about failing. If an idea does not work, you can just move on. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver have stories that are not perfect. This makes me feel better. You can learn from mistakes and use that in your next story.
When I write novels, I try to learn from what works and what does not in my short stories. Short stories help me experiment with ideas. It is hard to try new things in a novel, so without short stories, writing novels would be even harder for me. My short stories are like soft shadows I have left in the world. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. Short stories show my feelings, and I am happy to share them with my readers."

Science is a way to understand the world. It helps us in many ways, like curing diseases, but it can also create problems. Science tries to explain everything, from tiny ants to the universe. It has influenced many people, including poets and leaders. Sometimes, people do not understand science well, and its importance can be seen in different ways. 
Science has changed a lot over time. Old ideas are often replaced by new ones. This change can be difficult. Scientists can feel jealous or angry about each other’s ideas. The history of science is full of arguments. This book will talk about important ideas in science and how they changed our thinking. We will look at these ideas and think about their beauty and limits.
Science is always changing. There is always a scientist who finds something new that changes what we thought before. Most of the time, these changes do not disturb society. But sometimes, they can change our beliefs. For example, in the 1600s, scientists thought the universe worked like a big clock. Now, we know it is much more complicated. 
Some people think that science cannot explain everything. But when science changes, we often learn more about how nature works. For example, Isaac Newton explained more about the world than Aristotle did, and Albert Einstein explained even more than Newton. Science makes mistakes, but it keeps trying. 
At the end of the 1800s, many scientists thought there was not much left to discover. But then they found new things like radioactivity, X-rays, and the electron. Biology has also made many discoveries. Now, some people believe we are close to finding a complete explanation of the universe. 
Science is important. In the last 200 years, we have gone from just watching nature to controlling it in some ways. Sometimes, this can upset the balance of nature. People who do not study science need to understand it because it affects our future. Science is part of how we think about and shape our world. The choices we make in science can affect many things, like health and the environment.

Since about 2015, many big book publishers have said that sales of ebooks are not growing as before. In some cases, ebook sales have even gone down. This has made people question if ebooks will be important in the future. One publishing executive said that the excitement about ebooks may have led to bad investments, and his company lost trust in printed books. 
Even though it seems that ebooks and printed books can exist together, people still ask if ebooks will replace printed books. This question is interesting and makes people talk a lot. Why do we think of ebooks and printed books as being in competition? The answers to these questions tell us more about how we feel about new technology and change.
In my research, I found that people often think one type of media will replace another when new technology comes out. For example, when television was invented, many people thought radio would disappear. But radio found new ways to be used, like in cars and factories. The idea that books might disappear is not new either. In 1894, some people thought that the phonograph would replace books with audiobooks.
Many times, people have said that new things like movies, radio, and smartphones would end printed books. Some people worried that this would be bad for culture, while others thought ebooks would be much better. The idea that books might disappear often comes up when new technology is introduced. This shows our mixed feelings about change.
We feel strong connections to different types of media, like books and televisions. Studies show that we can even name our cars or get upset when our computers don’t work. When new technology, like e-readers, comes out, it changes our relationship with things we love. As technology changes, we often miss the things we used to have. This is why some people still want older products.
For example, when the printing press was invented in the 15th century, people wanted original manuscripts. When movies changed from silent to sound in the 1920s, people missed silent films. The same thing happened when photography changed from film to digital and from vinyl records to CDs. E-readers have made people appreciate the feel and smell of printed books more.
This should make people feel better about the future of printed books. However, the idea that books might disappear will continue to be a popular story about technology and change. One way we understand change is by using stories that are easy to remember, like stories of loss. The story of the death of the book shows both our excitement for new things and our fear of losing what we love. 
**Questions:**
1. What have many big book publishers said about ebook sales since 2015?
2. What did one publishing executive say about ebooks?
3. Why do people think ebooks and printed books are in competition?
4. What happened to radio when television was invented?
5. How do people feel about new technology and change?

Every weekday morning for a year and a half, I woke up at 5:30, brushed my teeth, made coffee, and wrote about how some great thinkers from the last four hundred years did their best work. I wanted to show how they organized their time to be creative and productive. By writing about their daily lives – when they slept, ate, worked, and worried – I hoped to give a new view of their personalities and careers. 
The French writer Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin said, “Tell me what you eat, and I shall tell you what you are.” I say, “Tell me what time you eat, and if you take a nap.” This book is about the daily habits of creative people, not just their work. It is also personal. The writer John Cheever said that you show something about yourself when you write, and I believe this is true.
I have questions that I think about in my own life: How can you do important creative work while making money? Is it better to focus on one project or to work a little each day? When there is not enough time, do you have to give up things like sleep or a clean house, or can you learn to do more in less time? I do not have all the answers, but I want to show how many successful people faced similar problems. 
The title of the book is Daily Rituals, but I really focus on people’s routines. A routine can seem boring, but it can help you use your time and energy better. The psychologist William James said that good habits can help us focus on important things. Ironically, he was a procrastinator and had trouble keeping a regular schedule.
This book started because of my own procrastination. One Sunday, I was at my job at a small architecture magazine, trying to write a story due the next day. Instead of working, I was cleaning my desk and making coffee. I am a “morning person” and can focus well in the morning, but I struggle in the afternoon. That day, I began to look online for information about other writers’ schedules. I found many interesting stories and thought someone should collect them. This led to the Daily Routines blog I started that afternoon and now this book.
The blog was simple; I shared people’s routines from biographies and articles. For the book, I gathered more information and tried to keep it interesting. I let my subjects speak for themselves with quotes from their letters and diaries. In some cases, I summarized their routines from other sources. I want to thank the many biographers and journalists whose work helped me. I have listed all my sources in the Notes section for further reading.

Howard wanted to be a palaeontologist when he was six years old. This happened after his father said they could not go on holiday to Spain because of money problems. Instead, they rented a small house on the beach in England. One day, on a rainy afternoon, Howard found an ammonite shell on the beach. He had always wanted to study ancient life, and by the end of university, he knew he wanted to study the very early creatures from a long time ago, not dinosaurs.
After finishing his studies, Howard worried about finding a job. He felt good about his skills, but he knew that sometimes good people do not get jobs. When a job opened at Tavistock College in London, he applied, but he did not expect much. 
On the day of his interview, the professor who was supposed to help with the interview had a fight with his wife. He was upset and had an accident, so he could not come to the interview. Another professor, who did not like the first professor, took his place. This professor helped Howard get the job, even though Howard did not know him well. Howard was surprised but happy to get the job. Later, a colleague told him that the situation was not fair, but Howard was just glad to have the job.
Howard enjoyed his work because he could plan and do his research. However, his personal life was sometimes chaotic. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his lecture notes while he was at the Underground station. He was very upset and went back to the college. He called to postpone his lecture and reported the theft. After that, he went for coffee and met a colleague who was with a visitor from the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. 
During this meeting, Howard learned about a new collection of fossils that needed to be studied. This was a big opportunity for him. Because of the theft, he changed his plans. He decided not to go to a conference in Stockholm or take students to Scotland. Instead, he would find a way to visit the museum in Nairobi. 
**Questions:**
1. Why did Howard want to be a palaeontologist?
2. What happened to Howard's holiday plans?
3. How did Howard feel about finding a job after university?
4. What accident happened to the professor on the day of Howard's interview?
5. What did Howard learn about at the coffee meeting?

Charles Spence will eat almost anything. He says, “We have ice cream made from bee larvae at home.” The ice cream may look strange, but it has a “slightly nutty, floral” taste. Spence is a Professor of Experimental Psychology at Oxford University in the UK. He studies how our senses work together to create the taste of food. He and his team are trying to make eating bugs more acceptable. 
Spence’s work affects what we eat and drink. He helps big food companies and famous restaurants with their menus. He studies many things that can change how we taste food, like who we eat with, how food is arranged, and even the color and weight of plates and cutlery. For example, did you know that the first person to order food in a restaurant usually enjoys their meal the most? And when we eat with one other person, we eat about 35% more food. If we eat with three people, we eat 75% more!
Spence’s lab in Oxford is simple. He uses basic tools and old audio-visual equipment. This helps him work with cooks who do not have much money for research. Most of his work is paid for by a big food company. In the past, some people thought that research funded by companies was not real science. But now, universities need to show that their work is useful, so this type of research is important.
Spence helps food brands reduce salt and sugar in their products. It is good for the companies because they want their customers to live longer. Many companies make these changes slowly so that customers do not notice. Spence says that when people know about the changes, they focus on the taste and often do not like it as much.
Spence met famous chef Heston Blumenthal while working on a project for a food company. At first, people thought science and food did not go together. But Spence and Blumenthal worked together to create a dish called “Sound of the Sea.” Spence says that sounds can change how we taste food. For example, high-pitched music can make food taste sweeter, while low-pitched sounds can make it taste bitter. 
Soon, an airline will match music with the food they serve. Last year, a well-known brand made a smartphone app that played music while your ice cream melts. However, they did not match the music to the taste, which is often a problem.
What are dinner parties like at Spence’s home? One time, they ate rabbit with the fur around the cutlery. Another time, they played with colorful lights. They even had a dinner party with headphones and different drinks to see how the sounds changed the taste. For Spence, home, sweet shops, food events, and conferences are all part of his research. 
**Questions:**
1. What unusual ice cream does Charles Spence have at home?
2. What does Spence study at Oxford University?
3. How much more food do we eat when we are with one other person?
4. Why is Spence's lab simple?
5. What does Spence help food brands reduce in their products?
6. Who is Heston Blumenthal?
7. What is the name of the dish created by Spence and Blumenthal?
8. How can sounds affect the taste of food?
9. What did Spence's family do at one of their dinner parties?
10. What types of places does Spence consider part of his research?

Our brains are very busy today. We get a lot of information, like facts, rumors, and opinions, and we have to figure out what is important and what we can ignore. We are also doing more things than before. Thirty years ago, travel agents helped us book flights, and salespeople helped us in stores. Now, we do many of these things ourselves. We are trying to manage our work, families, hobbies, and favorite TV shows, and we use our smartphones to help us. 
But there is a problem. We think we can do many things at once, but this is not true. Earl Miller, a scientist at MIT, says our brains are not good at multitasking. When we try to do many things at the same time, we are really just switching quickly from one task to another. This can make us less efficient. 
Multitasking can also increase stress in our bodies. It can make us feel confused and tired. Our brains like new things, so it is easy to get distracted by them. This makes it hard to focus on one task. 
Glenn Wilson, a psychology professor, found that trying to focus on a task while seeing an unread email can lower our IQ by almost 10 points. This means we can think less clearly. If students do homework while watching TV, they may not remember the information well. Without distractions, they can remember better.
Making decisions is also hard for our brains. Small decisions, like whether to answer a text, can take a lot of energy. After making many small decisions, we might make bad choices about important things. 
Many people, including business leaders and scientists, talk about the problem of too many emails. It is not just about emails themselves, but the huge number of messages we receive. One scientist’s son said his father answers emails for a living, and this is almost true. We feel we must reply to emails, but it is hard to do that and get other things done. 
**Questions:**
1. What do we have to do with the information we receive?
2. Who helped people book flights thirty years ago?
3. What does Earl Miller say about multitasking?
4. How can multitasking affect our stress levels?
5. What happens to students who do homework while watching TV?
6. Why do small decisions take a lot of energy for our brains?
7. What problem do many people talk about regarding emails?

In a zoo in Sweden, a chimpanzee named Santino broke concrete at night. He did this to throw pieces at visitors during the day. Was he being mean? In caves in the US, female bats help other fruit bat mothers if they cannot give birth properly. Are they being kind? Fifty years ago, people did not think much about these questions. They believed animals just acted in ways that could be measured, and science only looked at those actions. The idea that animals have feelings and thoughts was not taken seriously. 
But now, this is changing. Research on bats, chimps, rats, dolphins, and chickens shows that animals have emotions. This topic is now being studied more. Some popular science books, like Mark Bekoff’s *Wild Justice* and Victoria Braithwaite’s *Do Fish Feel Pain?*, talk about this. This has started a debate: do animals have thoughts and feelings like humans? 
There is also a question about conscience, which is a person’s sense of right and wrong. In a recent study with cows, those that opened a locked gate for food seemed happier than those that had help. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does this mean for eating beef? People agree on what they see, but they do not agree on what it means. Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, who wrote *Second Nature*, believes we should stop eating meat. He thinks we are close to a big change in how we think about ethics, like when slavery ended. 
Aubrey Manning, a professor, thinks we should think again about how animals think. He believes animals have a simpler way of thinking than humans. Professor Euan MacPhail thinks we should not put human feelings on animals. These three people may never agree because the main issue is not just science or morals, but philosophy. It is hard to define what consciousness is. Can we ever know what it is like to be a bat?
Balcombe did an important experiment that he believes shows that starlings, a type of bird, can feel sad. In a study at Newcastle University, starlings were put into two groups. One group had nice cages with space and water, and the other group had small, empty cages. Both groups learned to eat tasty worms from one box and avoid bad worms from another. But when only bad worms were offered, only the starlings in nice cages would eat. Balcombe thinks that being in a bad cage made the starlings feel negative about life.
Balcombe has worked with animal rights groups and has strong opinions. He says, “We look back and feel bad about racism. One day, we will feel the same about how we treat animals. We cannot support animal rights while eating meat.” If he were the only one with this opinion, it might be easy to ignore him. But Professor Aubrey Manning agrees with him. Manning has written a book about animal behavior. He says, “We are changing our views. In the past, some people thought animals thought like us, but now we are seeing things differently. This is a complicated topic, and we should listen carefully to different opinions.” 
**Questions:**
1. What did Santino the chimpanzee do at night?
2. What do female bats do for other fruit bat mothers?
3. How did people view animal feelings fifty years ago?
4. What did the cows in the study do when they opened the gate for food?
5. What does Dr. Jonathan Balcombe believe about eating meat?
6. What did the starlings in the study learn to eat?
7. Why does Balcombe think the starlings felt sad?

Critical thinking is a way to understand better what we read or hear. Adrian West, a research director, says that arguing can help us find the truth. Technology helps us store information and manage a lot of data, but it can also make it harder to think deeply about problems. West mentions that we see a lot of poor thinking and opinions that can confuse us. More information does not always mean we make better decisions. 
According to the National Endowment for the Arts, fewer people are reading books, and this is happening faster now. Patricia Greenfield, a psychology professor, believes that focusing more on visual media, like videos and games, may hurt our critical thinking. People are spending more time on quick media and doing many things at once instead of focusing on one thing.
We do not yet know exactly how technology affects critical thinking. Technology has changed how we think, and it can be both good and bad. For example, a computer game can help us think critically or make it harder to think deeply. Reading online can improve our analysis skills, but clicking on many links can distract us.
Greenfield says that reading helps our thinking and imagination more than visual media like video games and TV. Reading helps us think critically and learn new words. However, she also found that some visual media can help us process information. Unfortunately, many visual media do not give us time to think or reflect.
Many young people may not reach their full potential because of this. How society views technology affects how we think about critical thinking. There is a debate about video games and learning. James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games can be good for kids. They are not just entertainment; they can also help us learn. Some games teach decision-making and thinking skills in fun ways. 
In the digital age, as reading and math scores go down, we need to understand better how technology affects our thinking and analysis.

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic. He chose this job because he was unhappy with working in an office. He has written books about work and how to live in today’s world. In his latest book, he talks about how hard it is to focus because of many distractions around us. 
One day, while shopping, he saw ads on a credit card machine while he was entering his pin number. This made him think about how we are often distracted and cannot focus on what we want. He believes that we are not always aware of these distractions. Because of this, it is harder to think and remember conversations. People often avoid talking to strangers because they want to avoid interruptions.
Crawford says that we see the world through things like video games and apps, which can take over our lives. Many people complain about emails at work but still check their emails in their free time. Studies show that just seeing a phone can make it hard to pay attention. 
Crawford thinks that technology is not the only problem. He believes it makes us more focused on ourselves. With so many choices, it is hard to control what we do. For example, people prefer to text friends instead of talking to them. He worries that by only interacting with screens, we might lose important connections with real people.
He gives an example from his gym. In the past, there was one music player for everyone, which could cause some disagreements. Now, people listen to their own music with ear buds. This has made the gym less of a social place. 
Crawford has two ideas to help with these problems. First, we need to reduce noise and distractions in public places. Second, he believes we should practice skills that help us connect with the real world. For example, cooks, ice-hockey players, and motorbike racers must focus on real things. They cannot replace the real feeling of their activities with anything else.
Crawford says that when we engage with the real world, we see that fake experiences are not as good. He does not mean everyone should become a chef, but it is important to use our judgment. Focusing on one thing can help us pay attention to other things better.

"What do you do for a living?" This is a common question. We often say what our job is. But if you are a philosopher, like me, it can be a bit difficult. Saying "I am a philosopher" can sound a bit showy. It is better to say that you study or teach philosophy. Many people think philosophers know special truths, but this is not true. Philosophers are just like everyone else.
One reason people think this way is that philosophers often judge what others do and talk about thinking. A famous Greek philosopher, Aristotle, said that thinking about life is very important. Many modern philosophers do not agree, but people still connect philosophy with deep thinking.
Another Greek philosopher, Socrates, said that a life without thinking is not worth living. This means that just following what everyone else does can make life less satisfying. Thinking helps us control our lives and make our own choices. However, you do not need to read many books or be very smart to think about your life. It just means looking closely at your daily experiences to see if they are important.
Philosophy should help everyone, but sometimes it feels far away from real life. This is partly because academic philosophy has become very complicated and hard to understand. Philosophers often talk to each other and not to regular people. This makes philosophy seem distant from everyday life.
I sometimes call myself an "ethicist" because I study ethics, which is about what is right and wrong. Recently, I feel this title does not fully describe my work. Ethics is often seen as related to rules and laws. But there is more to ethics. It also looks at whether certain actions are fair or not.
For example, we might discuss if downloading movies illegally is wrong (it is) and then talk about responsibility and how we view art. Philosophy can help people think more about their actions and beliefs. Sometimes we might find out we already know the answer; other times, we may realize our beliefs are not easy to explain. By thinking about these ideas, we can help everyone. 
**Questions:**
1. What is a common question people ask about jobs?
2. Why is it hard for the author to say he is a philosopher?
3. What did Aristotle say about thinking?
4. What does Socrates believe about life without thinking?
5. What does the author study?
6. What is one example of a question philosophers might discuss?

People who love food, like foodies and chefs, often think about how we eat and what we eat. This can make eating more enjoyable. In the past, when philosophers talked about food, they usually used it to explain other ideas, like learning. Sometimes, discussions about food seem to be about food, but they often talk about other things too.
One famous philosopher, Epicurus, believed in seeking pleasure and avoiding pain. He talked about many activities, but people now often connect his name with enjoying food and drink. You can see his name in restaurants and food shops. These businesses hope that if they use his name, people will buy their food.
Food is also social and cultural. The food we eat comes from history and is shared with our communities. These communities help us grow and share food. We interact with food more than with other things, so it is a good topic to think about.
When food is ready, critics write and talk about it. Some people wonder why food critics are important. One philosopher said that tasting food is not a special skill; critics are just better at describing how food tastes. Most discussions about how we see things focus on sight, but we should also think about taste.
Another interesting point is about beauty. We often say paintings or music are beautiful, but we don’t usually say that about food. Some philosophers think that because food is becoming more popular, it should also be talked about in discussions of beauty, like art or poetry. However, food is eaten and gone, while art can last a long time. This makes it hard to say food is beautiful in the same way.
There are also many important questions about food. For example, what should we eat? Should we choose organic, free-range, or vegetarian foods? Our choices often show our beliefs. Philosophers like to ask why we make these choices, and this is a good topic to discuss.
Cooking at home is different from cooking in restaurants. Home cooks have a special duty to their friends and family. When we cook at home, everyone shares food and time together. But restaurant cooks have to follow rules for their jobs. Their kitchens are not open to everyone, and they work with colleagues, not friends.
A recent essay called "Diplomacy of the Dish" talks about how food can help people from different cultures connect. We can learn to enjoy other people's food and build friendships by eating together. This idea has been important in international relations for a long time. The essay includes many interesting examples and stories that make food philosophy exciting for everyone.

Rob Daviau is from the US and he makes special board games called ‘legacy’ games. He thought that the board games he played as a child were not fun or challenging anymore. So, he started to think about how board games could change. He wondered if they could have a story and if choices made in one game could affect the next game. 
He changed a classic game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, choices made by players during the game have lasting effects. Players might have to tear up cards, change the game board, or open new packets with new rules at important moments. The game is played over several sessions, and players can remember past actions. Daviau said, “You could point to the board and say: ‘Right here! You did this!’”
Later, he worked on a legacy version of another popular game called Pandemic, where players work together to cure diseases. His next game was called SeaFall. Pandemic Legacy was very popular, but many people thought SeaFall was a big test for legacy games because it was a new idea. In SeaFall, players are sailors in a time when ships were important (from the 16th to the 19th century) and they explore new lands.
Designers of legacy games must think about all the choices players can make to keep the story interesting. They ask people to test the games to see how they work. Jaime Barriga was a tester for SeaFall. He said, “It takes a lot of time. At first, the game is great, but after a few games, it can start to break. Then you have to fix everything.”
Legacy games were not expected to be very popular. Daviau thought it would only be liked by a few people. He said, “I thought it was different and good, but it was strange and broke many rules. I thought I would be known for this unusual project.” However, many players, like Russell Chapman, really liked the idea. He thinks it is one of the best changes in game design in years. He said, “It’s a new level of excitement. There’s nothing more exciting for a board gamer than to learn a new game.”
Another fan, Ben Hogg, said that the fun of a new adventure was more important than worrying about how long the game lasts. He mentioned that people don’t usually watch the same movie twice in the cinema. “You’re buying into an experience,” he said. Legacy games also take ideas from video games and popular TV shows. 
When he was in college, Daviau wanted to be a TV writer, but he ended up in advertising and then game design. He still loves telling stories. Matt Leacock, who created Pandemic, said that making a legacy game is like writing a book. “You need to know how you want it to end and where you want it to start,” he said. 
Daviau feels proud of his work but is curious to see what others will do with the idea. He thinks that soon players will want something new. Colby Dauch, who works for the company that published SeaFall, believes that the legacy format has changed how people think about board games.

One night not long ago, an octopus named Inky climbed out of his tank at the National Aquarium in New Zealand. He moved across the floor and squeezed into a small drain that led to the Pacific Ocean. This story was exciting and many people shared it online. 
People enjoy stories like this because they like to think that animals are like us. Octopuses are very smart, and they can do many interesting things. They can open jars, recognize faces, use coconut shells for protection, and even play games. 
Dr. Frans de Waal studies animals like gorillas and chimpanzees. He believes that we often do not see how smart animals are. He says that animals can think about the past and the future, feel empathy, and understand what others want. This means animals are smarter than we think.
In the past, people believed that animals were smart. For example, in medieval Europe, animals could be put on trial for crimes. Charles Darwin, a famous scientist, said that the difference between humans and animals is not so big. 
In the twentieth century, many people thought animals were just machines that respond to rewards and punishments. This idea made people forget that animals have feelings and thoughts. During this time, humans also harmed animal habitats and did not care about animal welfare.
Now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals are intelligent in their own way. He says that we are learning more about animal intelligence every day. 
He believes that tests for animal intelligence should consider what each animal can do best. For example, squirrels may not do well on human memory tests, but they can remember where they hide their nuts. 
In her book, The Soul of an Octopus, naturalist Sy Montgomery says that if an octopus tested human intelligence, it might judge us by how well we can change the colors of our skin. If we fail, the octopus might think we are not very smart.
Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really found a way to escape to the ocean. He knows that stories like Inky’s help people appreciate how smart animals are. He once did an experiment with capuchin monkeys to see if they can feel envy. When some monkeys got cucumbers and others got grapes, the monkeys with cucumbers got very upset. 
This study was published in a scientific journal, but a video of the experiment made more people believe the findings. This shows how our minds work in special ways. 
**Questions:**
1. What did Inky the octopus do one night?
2. Why do people enjoy stories about animals like Inky?
3. What are some things that octopuses can do?
4. Who is Dr. Frans de Waal?
5. What did Charles Darwin say about the difference between humans and animals?
6. How did people view animals in the twentieth century?
7. What does Dr. de Waal think about animal intelligence today?
8. What example does Sy Montgomery give about how an octopus might test human intelligence?
9. What happened in Dr. de Waal's experiment with capuchin monkeys?
10. Why was the video of the monkey experiment important?

Robots were once only in stories about the future, but now they are changing our world. Robots have been used in car factories and other industries for many years. Experts say that soon, robots will be used in many more areas, and many people are not ready for this change. 
Many people think that robots will do most of the work that humans do in the next 50 years. However, most people also believe that their jobs will stay the same. This is not true. Every job will be affected by robots in the coming years. For example, an Australian company called Fastbrick Robotics has made a robot named Hadrian X. This robot can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour, which would take two human workers a whole day to do. 
Another example is a robot called Tally, made by a company in San Francisco. Tally walks around supermarkets to check if the shelves are full and the prices are correct. It does not clean the aisles, as some might think. 
Supporters of robots say that robots cannot fix or program themselves yet. This means there will be new jobs for people who can work with robots. But some people worry that we need to keep the human touch in jobs. They think society is not ready for the changes that robots will bring. 
Dr. Jing Bing Zhang is an expert on robots and their use in business. He studies how robots will change jobs in the future. His recent report says that in two years, many robots will be smarter and able to work with other robots and humans. In three years, many big companies will have a special person in charge of robots. In five years, salaries in the robot industry will go up by 60%, but there will still be many jobs that cannot be filled because there are not enough skilled workers. 
Zhang says that robots will affect lower-skilled workers, which is sad. He believes that these workers need to learn new skills instead of waiting for the government to protect their jobs. People cannot expect to do the same job for their whole lives anymore. 
New technologies will create new types of robots that we have never seen before. These robots will live with us in our homes and interact with us in new ways. This is a big chance for companies, but it also brings challenges, like the need for new rules to keep us safe. 
With many jobs at risk, it is important to focus on education to prepare for the future with robots. Developed countries need more graduates in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) to stay competitive. 
**Questions:**
1. What is the name of the robot that can lay bricks quickly?
2. What does the robot Tally do in supermarkets?
3. What does Dr. Jing Bing Zhang study?
4. Why do some people worry about robots taking jobs?
5. What do developed countries need more of to stay competitive?

George Mallory, a famous mountaineer, was asked why he wanted to climb Mount Everest. He answered, "Because it’s there." This answer shows that many people want to know why someone would take such a big risk to climb a mountain. Some people might feel inspired by his answer to follow their own dreams. Climbing can be about adventure and having fun.
In 1967, a Bolivian writer named Tejada-Flores wrote an important essay called "Games that Climbers Play." He talked about seven different types of climbing, from playing on small rocks to climbing big mountains like those in the Himalayas. Each type of climbing has its own rules. This idea has become popular in climbing discussions in the West, including in magazines and conversations.
Many climbers love climbing because it makes them feel free. However, climbing can also be very difficult. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not a fun experience. This shows that climbing can be both freeing and limiting. Some people believe that having fewer choices while climbing can actually give climbers a sense of freedom.
Joe Fitschen, a US rock climber, thinks we should ask, "Why do people climb?" instead of just "Why climb?" He believes climbing is part of who we are as humans. We like to take on challenges and test our limits, even if it is risky. The joy of climbing is connected to our nature.
Another writer, Brian Treanor, says that climbing can help us develop important qualities like courage, humility, and respect for nature. He believes these qualities are very important in today’s world. Climbing can help us grow and live better lives outside of climbing.
Some expert climbers, Ebert and Robinson, believe that climbing alone is harder and deserves more recognition than climbing with a team or using extra help, like bottled oxygen. However, this idea has caused some debate because it might encourage climbers to take unnecessary risks.
Climbing can also be understood in different ways. Many climbers talk about being in the moment or feeling a flow while climbing. The physical effort, focus, and problem-solving in climbing are similar to ideas in Zen philosophy, which teaches how to find peace of mind. This gives us another reason to think about why people are attracted to climbing.

Alfred Brendel is a famous pianist who played classical music for over sixty years. He was very smart and serious, and he played many important piano pieces. He wrote a lot of music but did not teach many students. People who knew him saw that he could be fun, but he was usually serious in his concerts. He spent his time studying, traveling, and performing.
About four or five years ago, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel’s concerts and asked him for piano lessons. At first, Brendel did not think this was a good idea because he had very few students. He thought, “You don’t ask a mountain guide to teach a child how to walk.” But when he heard Kit play, he changed his mind. Kit was about 14 years old and played very well from memory. He even gave Brendel a CD of his performance, which was beautiful. Brendel thought, “I need to make time for him.”
Now, Kit is 19 years old and is always busy. He learns new languages, studies math, writes computer code, and plays tennis. His mother is always with him. Kit also composes music. Brendel says this is important because writing music helps you learn to read it better. He noticed that Kit has a great memory and can read music very well. Kit listens carefully to his own playing and understands Brendel’s lessons.
Brendel is careful not to raise expectations for Kit. He does not like it when newspapers call Kit the best pianist of the 21st century. He thinks this can be harmful. Young musicians can play some things very well, but they need time to improve on others. 
Now, at 80 years old, Brendel is more relaxed. He says that when he was young, he did not want to be famous quickly. He wanted to achieve certain goals by the time he was 50. When he turned 50, he felt he had done most of those things but still wanted to do more. Even though he cannot play as much now, he still thinks about music and enjoys his new life. 
**Questions:**
1. How long did Alfred Brendel play classical music?
2. What did Kit Armstrong ask Brendel at the concert?
3. Why did Brendel change his mind about teaching Kit?
4. What other activities does Kit do besides playing the piano?
5. How does Brendel feel about newspapers calling Kit the best pianist?

When I was a child, I thought gardens were beautiful places. My Grandad’s garden was by a river. It sloped down to the water. You could not reach the river, but you could hear the water and the birds in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this – a peaceful escape. 
Grandad’s garden was simple. He did not have a big greenhouse like some neighbors. Their greenhouses were made from old window frames. They used plastic to cover broken glass. 
At home, my father was quiet. He was not serious all the time. He liked to say funny phrases, like “It’s immaterial to me.” He could have said “I don’t mind,” but he liked the word “immaterial.” My father left school without any qualifications and became a plumber. He did not love plumbing; it was just a job. He was not very ambitious, but he and my mother thought about moving to Canada once, but it did not happen. 
My father was good at fixing things at home. He could build bookshelves or cupboards very well. My parents only moved house once. But my mother liked to change the furniture often. Just when you got used to one chair, a new one would appear. The biggest change was when a piano came into the house. I wanted to like it, but it made me nervous. I liked the two brass candlesticks on it, but my mother said they were too fancy, and they disappeared while I was at school. I was not allowed to play the piano; my sister had lessons instead. When I asked my mother why, she said, “You’d never have practiced.”
I liked the river the most when I could choose between moors, woods, or the river. I could imagine another world by the river. I would take a fishing net and wear old sandals with the front cut out for my toes. I walked along the riverbank looking for a good spot to take off my sandals and have a picnic. I would look for fish in the water to catch with my net. After trying to keep them alive in the yard, I had to put them back in the river.
I wanted to leave school quickly, but it seemed hard until one day my father said, “There is a job for an apprentice gardener in the Parks Department. I thought you might like it.” In that moment, my father surprised me. He might have preferred if I became a carpenter, but I think he hoped I would do well as a gardener. Even though he did not like gardening, he saw how much I enjoyed it.

Lawrence MacEwen is on his Scottish island, the Isle of Muck. I am with him. A strong wind is blowing, and it feels like we might be blown off the cliff and into the ocean below. But Lawrence’s sheepdog, Tie, comes close, and Lawrence pets him gently. The wind is loud, but Lawrence is happy on his island. 
Lawrence shows me around. He points to the north and shouts, “That island is Eigg. The one next to it is the Isle of Rum. It rains a lot there.” I see dark clouds and rain on Rum’s big mountains. “Beyond Rum is the island of Soay.” 
Suddenly, Lawrence says, “I have sheep to move.” We walk down the hill. He tells me about the island: Muck is three kilometers long and one and a half kilometers wide. The geese eat a lot of grass, and the MacEwen family has lived here for 3000 years. 
While moving the sheep, Tie is not doing a good job. Lawrence says, “Away to me, Tie,” which means the dog should go to the right. But Tie goes straight through the sheep, causing confusion. Lawrence sounds disappointed. 
The Isle of Muck is mostly run by the MacEwen family. Lawrence and his wife, Jenny, run the farm. Their son Colin takes care of the island cottages, and their daughter Mary runs the island hotel, Port Mor, with her husband, Toby. Mary and Toby like that their two boys can play outside and sail boats in the summer. “They go out and come back when they are hungry,” Mary says. 
But life on the island has some problems. There is electricity only sometimes. On my first night, I wait for the lights to turn on. The next morning, I see Mary making breakfast with a flashlight. I also have no mobile phone service. Mary tells me, “You can get a signal on the hill, but most people just put their phones away after a few days.” So I do the same. 
Everything on Muck feels special. A boat brings groceries and three musicians. They come to play music in the island’s tearoom, and everyone enjoys it. That night, by the warm fire, Lawrence tells me how he met Jenny. “Her father bought a small farm on Soay without seeing it. He had never been to Scotland. Jenny went to manage it.” I ask if Jenny knew about farming. “She was good at typing,” he replies. 
I go to bed with the sound of rain and wake up to more rain. But I eat well because most of the food comes from the island. Mary sends me to fisherman Sandy Mathers for fresh fish. I bring it back to Mary at the kitchen door. By 7 pm, we have the fish on the table, and it is very tasty. 
The next morning, I have to take a ferry to another island. Many ferries have been canceled because of bad weather. If my ferry does not come, I will be stuck on Muck for two more days. But secretly, I wish for that to happen.

The game design industry used to be mostly for computer scientists and self-taught people. Many people thought video games were just a hobby for young fans. Now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It is not easy to get into this industry. Making video games based on new movies needs many team members and a lot of skill and hard work.
Jim Donelly, who works for an online games magazine, says, “It is hard to get a job in big companies or to change big games. But the industry needs game designers now more than ever. They need not just the top people who manage the whole game, but also the people who design parts of the game.”
So, how can you start a career in this competitive industry? Many companies want people with a degree in computer science, but Jim thinks differently. He says, “The best way is to make games. You need to create something to get a job. Game design is not just a job; it is a way of life. You must create to be real.”
Another expert, John Field, agrees but adds that it is more complicated. “Many people want to work in games, but few have the skills needed today. You need creativity, technical skills, and the ability to help the industry grow.”
Can you work alone? “Maybe, but it is hard,” says John. “A good course in games can help you and give you support. Most game designers start as programmers or artists and then move up. They love all kinds of entertainment and art. They may have worked for a few years after school but know that games are their passion. They are not just fans; they are excited about the future of games.”
Connections can also help you get ahead in the game industry. This is important, just like in many other jobs. The idea of a young boy playing video games all the time is changing. Now, many families play games together on consoles and smartphones. John believes there is a lot of room for growth. “Games are popular with many people. They are also a fun way to learn, and I see many new opportunities in this area.” 
**Questions:**
1. Who used to work in the game design industry?
2. What does Jim Donelly say about getting a job in big companies?
3. What is the best way to start making games, according to Jim?
4. What skills do you need to work in the game industry?
5. How are families involved with video games today?

"Since I was a child, I have always wanted to play football. My dad encouraged me to play, and I am thankful for that. I had a friend who played with us, but his dad was very strict. He always said, ‘You can’t do this, you can’t do that.’ My friend could have been a good player, but he stopped wanting to play football. I am happy that I still love the game. 
When I score a great goal from far away, some people say it is just luck, but it is not. I have practiced shooting from a distance since I was young. You need to practice to score amazing goals. The best players in the world have talent, but they also practice a lot. 
Sometimes young players bump into each other, but I learned the right way to play. When I teach kids, I tell them to enjoy learning new skills. At school, I played many sports like rounders, baseball, athletics, and basketball. I know now that education is important, but football was my main focus then. 
I don’t want my son to be like me. We are already trying to read him books, even though he is too young to sit still. I hope he does not just want to kick the books around. 
At the start of my professional football career, the manager helped young players like me to play for the first team. He never made a big deal about it, but we knew we had to do our best. I scored in the first game of the season, but we lost. A famous TV presenter said, ‘You can’t win anything with kids.’ This made us realize we had to work hard. 
I trust my close friends and family a lot. Having money can sometimes cause problems. People ask me why I let my mother keep working. I help my parents with money. I paid off their house loan and bought them a car last Christmas. My family is strong, and they do not want to just take money from me. My mum loves her job as a hairdresser, even if she does not earn much. 
I enjoy using my money to help my family. I have a lot of money, but it does not solve all my problems. After I stop playing football, I want to take a year off to do things I have not done. I want to go skiing the day after I stop playing. I cannot do that now because if I break my leg while skiing, I cannot play football anymore."

We lived at Reef Point because of Sam Carter. Sam was my father’s agent in Los Angeles. He helped us find a cheap place to live because my father could not write anything in Los Angeles. Sam was worried about losing money and clients.
In the summer, the beach was empty because of the sea fog. Few people came to Reef Point. The road was not nice, and a better place, La Carmella, was nearby. Most people went there instead. Only those who had no money or loved surfing came to Reef Point. But now, with the hot weather, many people were at the beach. After being alone for months, we were now surrounded by people and activities.
My father was busy every day trying to write a script. I often went to the beach with a book and my dog, Rusty. When we first moved to Reef Point, we did not have a dog. Rusty came to us and would not leave. I tried to send him away, but he always came back. One morning, I felt sorry for him and gave him some water. My father threw a boot at him, but he did not really want to scare him. Rusty knew this and came closer. I asked my father, “Who does he belong to?” My father said, “He thinks we belong to him.”
Rusty loved the beach. He liked to dig and bring things to me. Sometimes he found things that were not his, like a sneaker or a beach towel. I had to give these back to their owners. Rusty also liked to swim. He always wanted to swim with me, even though I could swim faster. He never got tired of it.
One day, after swimming, my father went to Los Angeles to deliver his script. Rusty and I played in the sea all afternoon. As the sun began to set, it got cooler, and we watched the surfers. They had been surfing all day and looked very good. One surfer caught my eye. She was better than the others. When she finished, she came to us and said, “Hi, why didn’t you join us?” I replied, “I don’t have a surfboard.” She said, “You could get one.” I answered, “I have no money.” 
“Are you British? Are you visiting?” she asked. I said, “No, I live here.” She asked, “Is your father American?” I said, “No, he came here to write a film script from a novel he wrote.” She was surprised and asked, “What’s his name?” I said, “Rufus Marsh.” She then said, “You mean, Tall as the Morning?” I nodded. She smiled and said, “I read that book!” Now she was interested in me, and I thought this was how it always was. People were friendly but only cared when I mentioned the book.

Violet Hetherington was in a long line at the dock in Southampton. She was waiting to get on the Queen Caroline ship. Her friend Annie had told her, “It’s better to arrive late. If you come too early, you will just wait.” Annie was a good traveler, but this time her advice was not good. 
After some time, an announcement said there was a problem with the computer system. The people waiting became unhappy. They had paid a lot of money for this trip, and they wanted to enjoy it. Violet felt worried. She checked her bag and realized her phone was missing. This made her feel worse. She could not call the taxi company to see if she left her phone in the taxi because all her numbers were in her phone. 
Behind her, a friendly couple stood in line. Violet asked them, “I think I left my phone behind. Can I use your phone to make a call?” She called her son Harry and left a message for him to ask their neighbor Kristina to check if her phone was at home. If it was not there, she would have a problem because she needed her phone in New York. 
Finally, the line moved, and Violet gave her travel documents to the worker at the window. When she entered the ship, she felt disappointed. The inside looked like a fancy hotel but not a very nice one. There were shiny decorations and bright lights. 
Violet followed the signs to the elevators. The elevator was full of tired passengers. When it stopped at each floor, some people got out. At last, Violet reached the twelfth floor and stepped out. She was happy to see that her room had the balcony she wanted. She had worried about this, but now she felt relieved. She had paid a lot of money to make sure she had a nice view of the sea.

John Maloof bought a box of old photo negatives at an auction. He wanted pictures for a book about Portage Park, a neighborhood in Chicago, USA. Instead, he found 30,000 photos by Vivian Maier, a street photographer. Maloof has collected many things from Maier’s life, including her cameras, 2,000 rolls of film, 3,000 prints, and 100,000 negatives. He also has 8mm movies and audiotapes.
One morning, Maloof looked at all the items he found. He felt lucky. He said, “When I bought all this, I had no idea what it was. I could have sold it all to someone else.” Maloof and his friend Anthony Rydzon have been learning about Maier’s life. They talked to families who knew her when she worked as a nanny and to people who developed her film.
Vivian Maier was born in 1926 in New York and spent much of her childhood in France. She returned to New York in 1951 and moved to Chicago in 1956 to work as a nanny. Maier was a private person and always had a camera with her. She wore big coats, wide-brimmed hats, and sturdy shoes. Maren Baylaender, whose husband hired Maier, said, “On her day off, she had her camera and we wouldn’t see her until late at night.” Maier had strong opinions about movies and politics.
Maier loved theatre and movies. She was not very social, but she walked the streets with her camera and talked to people. She recorded some of these conversations. She was very dedicated to her “second job” of documenting the world around her. Rydzon said, “She was a true artist and followed her dreams.”
Maier’s work is real art; she did not create it for money. Her photos often show women, children, the elderly, the poor, and abstract scenes. Photography expert Larry Silverman said, “Vivian has many interesting pictures.” He thinks her work shows the influence of other photographers. Maloof wonders if he will ever go through all the negatives he has stored in three fireproof cabinets. 
Before finding Maier’s work, Maloof was not interested in photography. After seeing her architectural photos, he started taking pictures himself. He said, “I realized that the people and street scenes were more important than I thought. I was sitting on something more important than I ever imagined. Now our goal is to make Vivian Maier known and get her into the history books.”

When people say a novel is ambitious, they often mean it might not be very good. But this is not true for Eleanor Catton’s book, *The Luminaries*. I talked to her in the UK when her book was very popular. She was calm, even though she was still in her twenties. She had just come from Germany and was going back to New Zealand the next day. 
Eleanor told me a story about being stopped at passport control. An official asked her to prove she was a writer. She showed her novel to him. The official looked at it and asked, “What is it about?” This is not an easy question for a writer. 
*The Luminaries* takes place in New Zealand in the 1860s. There are many crimes, and twelve men come together to solve them. The story is very complex. Eleanor wanted to write a murder mystery, not a historical novel, but she found that the past gave her many ideas for her characters. The book is more than 800 pages long because she wanted to give each of the 20 main characters a good story.
When I asked her how it feels to be so successful at a young age, she said it feels nice to come from a small country. She feels that people at home share in her success. She also said it is annoying when people think her book is not serious. 
Eleanor wanted to write the book in a special way. She made each part half the length of the part before it, so the story speeds up as you read. I asked her if it matters if readers notice this. She said she wanted to create patterns in the book that readers could see if they wanted to.
Even with its special structure, *The Luminaries* is still an exciting murder mystery. Surprisingly, Eleanor did not know how the story would end when she started writing. She would write herself into difficult situations and then find creative ways to get out of them. She also wanted to make the book fun for readers.
We talked about her love for TV dramas. I asked if she would like to write for television. She said that could be cool. She was very excited when she talked about her writing and New Zealand. She noticed that being in a different place changes how she thinks. She understands why writers leave New Zealand for busy cities to be around more people. But for now, New Zealand is still her home. I hope it gives her ideas for many more novels. 
**Questions:**
1. What is the name of Eleanor Catton's book?
2. How old was Eleanor when she became successful?
3. Where is *The Luminaries* set?
4. How many main characters are in *The Luminaries*?
5. What did Eleanor want to create in her book?

When Jonny Kinkead was a boy, he liked to make things in his dad’s garage and play the guitar. For the last forty years, he has built acoustic guitars by hand. Jonny loves the guitar. He wonders how two pieces of wood can make a beautiful sound. He learned to play his brother’s guitar when he was eleven. At sixteen, he wanted a bass guitar. Instead of saving money for one, he decided to make it himself. He studied how different shapes and types of wood change the sound of the guitar.
Jonny built his first bass guitar, but he did not think about making guitars as a job at that time. He also liked painting and sculpture. After school, he went to university to study architecture because he liked design. But halfway through, he left because he wanted to do something different. He realized that making guitars is like making art, but it is also useful because people can play them.
Since then, Jonny has made guitars for a living. For the first ten years, he cleaned windows to earn extra money. At first, he sold his guitars for the cost of materials, but later he became known as a good guitar maker and could charge more. Even now, after almost forty years, he says he is still just getting by. He can only make about ten guitars a year, which limits how much money he can make.
In the beginning, Jonny worked hard to get known. He went to music festivals and let musicians try his guitars. He also had to learn how to price his guitars because he did not think about money much. Jonny believes it is easier for new guitar makers today. When he started, many people thought only American-made guitars were good. But now, UK-made guitars are respected too. 
Jonny thinks new guitar makers should take classes to learn important skills. However, he also believes that learning by trying and making mistakes is very important. He says it is good to look at other instruments and see what works and what does not. If you make the back of a guitar too thin or too thick, it will not sound good. If you learn from someone else, you may only learn one way, but if you teach yourself, you can learn many things.

When people talk about English conversation, they often start with the weather. A famous writer from the 1700s, Dr. Johnson, said, "When two Englishmen meet, their first talk is of the weather." This is still true today. Many people wonder why English people talk about the weather so much. They think it is because English people are very interested in it. 
However, some writers, like Bill Bryson from America, say that English weather is not very interesting. He points out that in England, there are not many exciting weather events like tornadoes or big storms. But another writer, Jeremy Paxman, disagrees. He believes that English weather is interesting because it is always changing. He says that in England, you can never be sure what the weather will be like.
I think both Bryson and Paxman miss the real reason why English people talk about the weather. It is not just about the weather itself. When English people say things like "Nice day, isn’t it?" or "Ooh, isn’t it cold?" they are not really asking about the weather. These phrases are ways to start a conversation or fill a pause. 
Talking about the weather is a way for English people to connect with each other. There are three main times when they use weather talk: as a greeting, to start a conversation, or when there is a quiet moment and they need something to say. This is why it seems like English people talk about the weather all the time. A conversation might start with a weather greeting, then move to other topics, and go back to the weather when there is a pause. This is why many people think English people are obsessed with the weather.

Alice Leader was standing in front of Hadrian’s Wall in Britain. She was with her class of 12- and 13-year-olds. She wanted to explain how amazing it was that the Romans built this wall. It is 120 km long and 5 meters high, built about 1900 years ago. The students were excited about this trip. They chose it instead of going to Spain, Greece, or France. But they wanted to know why the wall was built. Alice felt she did not have good answers for them. 
Alice could not find a good historical novel about life at the Wall in Roman times. So, she decided to write one herself. After teaching for 31 years, Alice started a new career as a writer in 2001. She felt nervous but also excited. She said, “Teaching is like acting. It is hard work. Writing is exciting, but it is not so tiring.” Alice’s friends from teaching were happy for her because she still connects with children through her stories.
Alice wants her books to be different from many books for young people today. She thinks many of these books talk about sad things or are just fantasy, like Harry Potter. She wants her books to be real but also fun. Alice always taught English and History together. She loved to see when children went from being bored to being interested. 
Alice started writing because she felt she had time after her two sons left home. Her head teacher suggested she take a creative writing course. At first, Alice did not want to do it. But she had to send a story to the teachers before she could join the course. She quickly wrote a story about a Roman couple and their baby. After three hours, she had 30 pages and sent it in. She was accepted into the course. 
During the course, other students read her story and gave her good feedback. They told her to publish it. Alice asked her school head teacher for a year off to write her first novel. Her husband, Zachary Leader, helps her with editing her work. Alice says, “My mother-in-law thinks we are rivals, but we work well together. He helps me change sentences and words. I like to add more scenes.”

To raise money for charity, a newspaper and a TV company asked two brothers, Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, to join a special race. In the beautiful Yorkshire Dales in northern England, Jonny would drive a car on the roads, and Alistair would ride a mountain bike across the countryside. 
“I’m excited!” Jonny said at the start line. “I have never done this before. The views are beautiful, and it is cold, so I will be warm in the car.” Alistair was also excited, but he wore warm cycling clothes. “I have seen Jonny drive before, so I am not sure he will win. I might stop for tea on the way,” he joked.
The race started at Semerwater lake and would finish at Fleet Moss, which is very high up. Jonny’s car could go fast, but Alistair had to ride up a steep hill first. They quickly shook hands and began the race. Alistair rode away on his bike, while Jonny got in his car.
Jonny’s confidence went down quickly. Just 15 seconds into the drive, a big tractor came onto the road. “Welcome to Yorkshire,” he said to the cameraman. “If Alistair beats me, it’s because of this farmer!” After getting past the tractor, Jonny drove on. 
Alistair was having a hard time. He had to get off his bike and carry it up the hill. Some sheep watched him as he walked with the bike on his shoulders. Finally, he reached the top of the hill. The sun came out, and he started to ride faster.
In the car, Jonny faced another problem. The roads in the villages were very narrow. He had to drive slowly and even went through a small stream on the road. After leaving the last village, he drove straight to the finish line. Neither brother knew how close they were to each other.
As Jonny drove fast to the finish, Alistair was riding hard too. He reached the finish line and asked the crowd, “Is he here?” When they said no, he raised his arms and shouted, “Yes!” A few minutes later, Jonny arrived in his car. “Well done,” he said to Alistair, looking disappointed. “I’m sad.” 
**Questions:**
1. What were the names of the two brothers in the race?
2. What did Jonny drive in the race?
3. What did Alistair ride in the race?
4. Where did the race start?
5. How did Jonny feel at the beginning of the race?
6. What problem did Jonny face while driving?
7. What did Alistair have to do when he was riding up the hill?
8. How did Alistair feel when he finished the race?

When you play on Centre Court at Wimbledon, it is very quiet. You bounce the ball on the soft grass. You toss it up to serve and hit it. You can hear the sound of your own shots. The quietness helps me focus on the game. 
After a point is finished, the silence breaks with applause and cheers. I know there are many people watching, but I am very focused on the match. In 2008, I played Roger Federer in the Wimbledon final. This was the biggest match of my life. I had always wanted to play at Wimbledon. My uncle Toni, who is my coach, told me it is the most important tournament. 
When I was 14, I dreamed of playing there and winning. Before 2008, I had played Federer two times and lost. In 2006, I was happy just to be there, but in 2007, I was very sad after I lost. I knew I could have played better. I cried for a long time in the dressing room. Losing hurts, especially when you have a chance to win. 
Toni usually does not comfort me, but after my loss in 2007, he told me not to cry. He said there would be more chances to play at Wimbledon. I thought that was my last chance. I know that a professional athlete's career is short, and I want to make the most of it. 
In 2008, I had another chance. I felt confident that I had learned from my past loss. The night before the final, I had dinner with my family and friends. We did not talk about the match because I was already thinking about it in my mind. I wanted to keep that space for myself until the match started.

In early April 1957, a young Englishwoman named Jane Goodall arrived in Africa. In her first letter home, she wrote, "I am living in the Africa I have always wanted." She spent most of her life in Africa as a citizen, journalist, scientist, activist, and environmentalist. 
In 1963, Jane became famous when Britain’s National Geographical Society made articles and TV shows about her research on chimpanzees. She wrote many books for the public, including children’s books and the popular book "In the Shadow of Man," which has been translated into 47 languages. Jane Goodall is one of the most famous female scientists of the 20th century. 
Many stories about her life focus on her adventures and dreams, but they often do not show her real achievements. Jane Goodall is a pioneer in her field and is known as a leading zoologist. She helped us understand the social and emotional lives of chimpanzees. Before her work, people did not know that chimpanzees ate meat or used tools. We also learned that chimpanzees have emotions like humans and that they have different cultures in their communities.
Her book, "The Chimpanzees of Gombe," published in 1986, is an important work in chimpanzee research. Jane Goodall studied wild chimpanzees in Gombe State, Nigeria, for many years. Her work changed how we study animals and how we think about ourselves as humans.
Even as a child, Jane showed signs of becoming a biologist. When she was five years old, she disappeared one day. The police and her family searched for her. After a long search, she came back with straw in her hair and clothes. When her mother asked where she had been, Jane said she wanted to know how hens lay eggs. To find out, she hid in a henhouse for five hours until a hen laid an egg. This moment can be seen as the start of her journey as a biologist.

In our first conversation, Shirley Ford talks to me using different voices. She sounds like a funny 8-year-old boy, a tired mother, an old Scottish woman, and a fast-talking alien. People who watch children’s TV and cartoons know her voices. “I just did a voiceover about back injuries,” she says. “I had to learn how to say many medical words quickly.” 
Shirley explains what it takes to do voiceovers. “Many actors think they can do funny voices, and some can,” she says. “But it is more than that. You have to make the script exciting for people who cannot see you. Many famous people want to do voiceover work. Producers invite them to auditions, but they often do not get the job because they are used to acting with their whole bodies.”
After school, Shirley took a drama course. She wanted to be an actor. During the course, she sometimes sang jingles for TV ads. “One day,” she says, “the man at the recording studio asked me to try out for the voice of a rabbit in a cartoon. It seemed silly – I didn’t study drama to play rabbits – but I tried it for fun and got the part!” Shirley found out she could do voices and thought voiceover work could be her path. “Things just happened for me,” she says. “In my second film, I was lucky to play the main character, her brother, and her mother.”
Adult women often do the voices for small boys and girls. Their voices are higher than those of men. It is complicated to hire child actors, so companies prefer to use adult women. Shirley learned to make different sounds and to not always sound the same. She watches children’s TV to collect new voices. 
Cartoons are the best part of her job, which also includes educational videos and vacuum cleaner ads. “Those are hard because I have to sound excited about something I don’t care about, but my experience helps,” she says. “I learned that smiling while talking makes my voice sound happy.” When she works on animation, it feels like a holiday because she enjoys working with other actors.
